title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.18 - Assignment of security interests
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.18 - Assignment of security interests

State Regulations

If a lienholder assigns a security interest in a vehicle
to another party, he should submit the proper notice of recorded lien (Form
MV-901) appropriately completed to the assignee. The assignee, if he wishes to
have his name appear as lienholder on the certificate of title, shall forward
the completed notice of recorded lien (Form MV-901) to the Title Bureau, Department of Motor Vehicles, South Mall, Albany, NY 12228, together with the
appropriate fee. The department will request the title holder to submit his
certificate of title, and upon receipt, will issue a new certificate of title
showing the assignee as lienholder and a new notice of recorded lien will be
sent to the assignee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
20.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
